column5: Greetings - we are planning a trip to Lil Shab lake and was wondering if anyone can give me information on the lake or reports- thanks in advance- Tom

Hey Tom, Bummer that Wabakimi won't work out for your group. I don't know much about Lil Shab other than it's strictly a catch and eat lake. Don't get to bring any fish home from there. Kinda like that rule, makes for a healthy fishery. Have a great trip and please report back.
I have some friends that have been there had a good time and got lots of fish.

Class flying with NWO all the lakes are good bring crawlers, salted minnows or live minnows (NWO has them) Let us know about your trip.Your cabin is beautiful. The 1st week is sept we find walleyes in 18ft to 25 ft humps drop offs and reefs. Troll spinners watch out for the big northerns. We will be flyng to Mink Early sept.
